activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Khetha ibinzana lokudlula ukuze ungene ngemvume.
Ibinzana elilula elinamazwi ambalwa ozolikhumbula kalula.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Khetha ibinzana elidlula ukuvikela i-akhawunti yakho. Bona ukusikisela kwemibono ethile.
activate.IfYouFeel: Uma uzizwa ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle, ungakwazi

notifications.title: Imvume
notifications.prompt: Ingabe ufuna ukunika amandla izaziso? Uzothola izibuyekezo zangempela-isikhathi mayelana nezinto ozikhathalelayo.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Siyakwamukela! Sicela uqinisekise ikheli lakho le-imeyili.
